mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_sys_user_role
ROLE_ID = #{roleId},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where USER_ID = #{userId}
